DataElement.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Erectile Dysfunction Severity Breakpoint Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number range of scores that represents the erectile dysfunction severity breakpoint classification in the Sexual Health Inventory for Men.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sexual Health Inventory for Men Erectile Dysfunction Severity Breakpoint Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 5-item questionnaire for screening and diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) and severity of ED in clinical practice and research._Scoring groups for the Sexual Health Inventory for Men: 1-7, Severe erectile dysfunction; 8-11, Moderate erectile dysfunction; 12-16, Mild to Moderate erectile dysfunction; 17-21,  Mild erectile dysfunction._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.: Persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.
A disorder characterized by the persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.: Persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: Gentle or temperate in nature or degree.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
A disorder characterized by the persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
A disorder characterized by the persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.: Persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.
A disorder characterized by the persistent or recurrent inability to achieve or to maintain an erection during sexual activity.
